info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 12:24AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN FALL RIVER COUNTY THROUGH 115 AM MDT... At 1224 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Provo, or 5 miles south of Edgemont, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Provo around 1230 AM MDT. Rumford around 1235 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ardmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
